A single member of the Italian Parliamen: Sara Cunial, made a speech calling for the arrest of Bill Gates.
There is no evidence that Cunial: s speech was supported by the entire Italian Parliament.
Other fact: checking organizations, including Snopes, Republic World, and Polygraph.info, have debunked the claim.
Cunial: s speech was interrupted by vocal objections from other members of parliament, indicating a lack of widespread support for her viewpoint within the Italian government.
